about_the_game:
Long ago in a distant land there lived the most beautifulfest queen of fairykin, Wika Wicked Wind. Her indomitable will kept her kingdom in peace and safe from the ever threatening Big Nothing. Now she's in big big trouble! A mischievous wind goblin has used the power of a dark magem crystal to spread poison throughout her lands. The creatures of her fairy kingdom have become lazy, listless, scared, and often violent! You have been chosen, Lil' Sebastien, as her champion. The only cure for the madness of shadow is a precious axolotl egg from an ancient beast's lair. Lucky for you, Scoutmaster Vampal has already got the egg--you with your small spritely wings must finish the journey against all odds! In Wika's land, everything is dangerous for an egg--including the ground. Go with haste Lil' Sebastien and discover the dark secrets of Queen Wika's Fairy Kingdom!

Features


  • 8 hand-drawn and colorful levels of increasing difficulty as the forces of Zephyr become increasingly desperate to stop you from entering Queen Wika Wicked Wind's protected lair.
  • 6 giant bosses that guard the precarious paths with no mercy for Lil Sebastien.
  • Countless secret areas and items to find throughout the fairy kingdom.
  • Carefully designed levels with multiple paths and options for speedrunning.
  • Deep and rich lore slowly discovered with progression if Lil' Sebastien has the patience to listen.
  • Colorful cast of fairy creatures, some friend and some foe--all with something to say.
  • Constantly tuned difficult but fair game play.
  • Huge beautiful soundtrack with instrumentation and rhythm reminiscent of Nintendo's SNES era

name: Wicked Wika's Egg Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: 1.2ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Dare to be Queen Wika's courier in Wika Wicked's Egg; the most dangerous side-scrolling platform adventure in all the fairy lands. Can you, the mere fairykin sprite Lil' Sebastien, bring her this precious, fragile egg before the forces of darkness overwhelm the land & seal her kingdom forever?
